resources.string:
Tested Versions

MSAL: 0.x.x
Android: 18-25
Android Studio: 2.2.3 

This app is intended to demonstrate best practices when using MSAL with Azure AD. If you encounter any problems with the sample, SDK, or Service please create a new github issue or post on StackOverflow with tag `azure-active-directory`.

 This sample is under the MIT License, please see LICENSE for more info.
